text: Inventing the Flat Earth (1991; ) is a book by historian Jeffrey Burton Russell debunking the notion that medieval Christians believed the earth was flat."... shows how nineteenth-century anti-Christians invented and spread the falsehood that educated people in the Middle Ages believed that the earth was flat" Russell's summary of his book ==See also== *Myth of the Flat Earth ==Notes== Category:1991 non-fiction books Category:20th-century history books Category:History books about Christianity Category:History of geography
title: Inventing the Flat Earth
